annotations.description: The Artichoke Hold was created by Jeremy Oertel at the Williamsburg Restaurant Donna. The Artichoke hold makes masterful use of both St. Germain and Cynar br...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Artichoke Hold

textContent:
.75oz (22.5ml) Jamaica Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Cynar
.5oz (15ml) St. Germain
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Orgeat
Mint Sprig Garnish

Whip shake and open pour into rocks glass. 
Top with crushed ice and garnish with mint sprig. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ja3FPq3f9fE
title: Artichoke Hold
